//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;

//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix c0       4
//   LocalToWorld         c6       4
//   TemporalAAParameters c10      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, 0, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0, v1
    mov o1, c4.x
    mul r0, c7, v0.y
    mad r0, c6, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, v0.z, r0
    mad r0, c9, v0.w, r0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0

mov o3, r0 // Relocated from line 41 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 E3E6380B.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o3, r0 // Relocated to line 40 with shadertool.py

// approximately 14 instruction slots used
